name: Hungry Wiggles - First Playable
description:
Wiggles is a very hungry kitty! Help him get his fill of pizza and burgers in this endless scrolling game. Simply move left and right with the A and D keys, or the left and right arrows on your keyboard.

This is a basic game in its first playable stage, made in order to learn basic Unity coding skills. Feedback on how to improve the game is welcome.
